sharedcoin.com.pk_seed: Seed to use when generating private keys
sharedcoin.com.token_encryption_password: Encryption key to use for tokens (Think of it a a cookie encryption password)
sharedcoin.com.auth_code: The authenticaiton code for the admin panel
sharedcoin.com.api_code: Apply for an API code on blockchain.info
cors_domains: List of CORS permitted domains or wildcard *
